channel.title: EarthScape PKz (Pimpscape Based) Char Reset Often
channel.description: Sometimes people's character get reset and they have to start from scratch again...any idea what's happening? because EarthScape PKz is a really good source and I dont know to change source because of 1 major error >.<

item.title: EarthScape PKz (Pimpscape Based) Char Reset Often
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

If you want the characters to be reset.
I think that you can create a batch file.
That links to a java file.
The file contains to write the character file lines to default.
I’m not sure how to do this, but it is possible.
